Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your business or personal projects. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring we receive a fair return for our efforts and resources invested into this product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
